document.full_text: a report says some of the schools in pakistan and afghanistan that greg mortenson claims to have established either don't exist or were built by others. mr. mortenson stood by his book.
document.title: '60 minutes' casts doubt on book
lines_and_colors: a report says some of the schools in pakistan and afghanistan that greg mortenson claims to have established either don't exist or were built by others. mr. mortenson stood by his book.
